love island, apart from being absolute tripe is a tv show that promotes people being fake, is completely downgrading to men and women alike and encourages unfaithfulness as well as giving the people watching false aspirations as to what they should look and be like.

It is well documented the health implications of not only contestants of these TV shows but also the masses that follow them, leading to debt, insecurity and mental health issues directly relating to the misconception of what “beautiful” is.
